mapper.select: select m.name, ua.id as username, m.password as password, a.authority as auth from user_authority_tbl2 ua, member_tbl2 m, authority2 a where ua.id = m.id and ua.authority_seq = a.seq and ua.id = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl2(id, password, name, phone, email, reg_dt, mod_dt, del_yn, nickName, address) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, sysDate, sysDate, 'n', #{nickName}, #{address})
